description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface, used for unit testing or mocking dependencies within the software project.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns a string representing the version information.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns a string representing the locator string.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name as a string.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the shell.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Returns whether the session has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature (specified by a uint8_t) is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a message or task related to a uint32_t.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with specified strings.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Returns whether the service runs in the background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for the current state.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overload)
methods.description: Returns configuration line string for a given string input.

methods.name: StartMode (overload)
methods.description: Starts the service in a specified mode.

methods.name: Resumed (overload)
methods.description: Indicates whether the session is resumed.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernates the service with a reason.
